shorts.title: Clipboard, August 5, 2025
shorts.description: Clifford Twp. Food sale/flea market: St. John the Baptist Russian Orthodox church food sale and flea market, Aug. 23, 8 a.m.-1 p.m., 378 Lyon St. (off Route 247 past Dundaff Corners). Halushki, pierogi, wimpies and bake sale items. East Scranton Casino bus trip: Casino bus trip to Resort World Catskills, Sept. 3, leaves Scranton at 9 a.m. and departs casino at 4:30 p.m., $49/person includes $40 rebate ($25 slots, $15 food) and tip for bus driver. Photo ID required at casino. Call Tom at 570-909-4266 for seats. Elmhurst Women’s luncheon: Women of Elmhurst Country Club Let’s Play Luncheon, Aug. 22, […]

shorts.title: Lackawanna County Court Notes, August 5, 2025
shorts.description: MARRIAGE LICENSES Alexandra Joan Froese and Michael Patrick Ryan, both of Daleville. Jose Manuel Perez Tavarez, Blakeslee, and Adalgisa Tavarez De Jesus, Old Forge. William Jesus Rosado Medina and Jhaneth Guadalupe Ovando Carvajal, both of Moosic. PROPERTY TRANSACTIONS Raymond and Jennifer Spinosi, Dunmore, to Brian M. and Megan M. Judge, Dunmore; a property at 600 E. Swinick Drive, Dunmore, for $378,000. Eddy Acevedo Jr., Dunmore, to Joseph Talutto III and Alexis Fumanti, Dunmore, as joint tenants with rights of survivorship; a property at 1307 Grandview St., Dunmore, for $256,470. shorts.content: MARRIAGE LICENSES Alexandra Joan Froese and Michael Patrick Ryan, both of Daleville. Jose Manuel Perez Tavarez, Blakeslee, and Adalgisa Tavarez De Jesus, Old Forge.
